Reviews:
Found what I need friendly and courteous customer service, in and out quickly, well stock store for automotive needs.; Horrible experience. Be aware of questionable practices. I went to service my car to install a new battery and the website clearly mentioned that battery installation was free. When I went to the store, they told me that I had to pay $25 for the installation. They used SKU/CODE 9801958 (LABOR-BATT CORROSION) to bill me for that "installation service". I tried talking to the assistant manager but still, they told me I needed to pay $25 for the installation, regardless of what the website mentioned. Be aware if they bill you for a "battery installation service" under a questionable SKU/CODE with a totally different description of service.; First rate shop!!!  I had my best ever experience with these fine people!
From a detailed diagnosis to a timely and professional repair on my car.  The professional service given by Noel was a breath of fresh air, and I enthusiastically recommend him for immediate promotion to any position he may wish!  Thanks for everything!; Outstanding service.  My go to place for my cars; I've been a client of Western Auto, now AdvanceAuto Hatillo for over 25 years.  The ONLY place I take my car.  People say they're too expensive,  but I say not if you have to keep bringing in your car to the mechanics for the same thing, AdvanceAuto is not too expensive and with guarantee.

Reviews:
Excellent shop with well-managed cigar humidor. Highly recommended. Thanks for the Olivas!
PS: Beer recommendation was a hit; They have a limited selection of cigars however very good price points and the ones that I got were excellent for the price! It looked like they had a fabulous selection of wine and spirits and definitely specialty items that the owner carries and I'm sure that he can get in certain things for you if requested. I really don't drink anymore but I can tell you that they had an excellent selection of wine, and also bourbons, Scotch whiskeys, and all around very specialty types of spirits. The owner is very friendly and very knowledgeable. I believe he mentioned to me that his background was as a chef at several different locations in the Twin Cities in Minneapolis-Saint Paul and elsewhere.  I know that you'll be pleasantly surprised and you will have an excellent experience in purchasing your special select beverages and if you're a cigar smoker I'm sure you'll be able to find something that suits your tastes!; Love this store!! This will be my first stop every time I come to Decorah.; Impeccable selection of fine wine and spirits.  Every single thing that's on the shelves is top notch. 10/10 would recommend.

Reviews: Very clean, stocked full of variety and sizes. Convenient pickup spot off 820 and 35 near kroger, the movie theater, sushi, Italian ice, Coffee, and stip clubs. Sometimes they have samples, small supply of cigar,vape,smoke needs. Mixers and candies, cold grab and go, soju flavors, and easy to find stuff.; Such friendly staff. They have a lovely selection of all things bubbly💕. Just tried a sample of this delicious Adult Chocolate 🍫 Milk by Lockwood Distillery.; Stop by and sample Suntory’s new Vodka Seltzers until 8pm. Now crafted in the U.S.; This is the new store in town. I have been here since it opened approximately 8 times. I have went to Liquor King the past 4 years and decided to try this one since it was closer. When you walk in. It’s all friendly and then it becomes unfriendly quick. They just want you to buy and they don’t care after that. They should go and model their business model and culture after Liquor King. The make behind the counter is deceitful and shady. One day I went in and the machine was down.  I spent just a little north of $100 total. He said the machine was down and ask can he write down my name and he said he would write the amount so he can add the points. I said no big deal don’t want you to lie to me. When you can just say maybe next time. He said no, I got it. Of course, he was lying. He was just talking trying to keep business, not know I’m coming back anyways. I came back and I was like yeah my points. And he gave me 12 points. No points is better than anything but don’t lie to me to try to sale. That rub me the wrong way.; I had an excellent experience at this liquor store! The selection is vast and well-curated, offering everything from top-shelf spirits to unique, local craft beers. What really stands out is the staff's expertise and friendliness; they were incredibly helpful in guiding me to some fantastic finds within my budget. Prices are competitive, and the store itself is clean and welcoming. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for quality beverages and great service. Will definitely be back!

Cashier was very nice and professional; Found what I was looking for! So on my last trip to Puerto Rico, I rented a car which I assumed would have GPS but didn't. I was stuck using my phone but had no where to place it comfortably in the car. I knew from the past that Marshalls have phone car stands. I went and found one immediately at the entrance by the cash registers. Purchased it and was out the door in like five minutes.; Went to get dog toys and men's cologne. Bring more men’s clothing otherwise I have to go to Barcelonetas outlet mall 10 minutes away from here.

Plenty of parking. Big, busy discount store. And they have EVERYthing in this place. Aisles  are packed with merchandise, yet somehow they are able to keep everything very neat & orderly. Long line to checkout today, but it moves. I admire stores like this, except:
I do not admire the fact that they do not offer refunds. Only exchanges.  Says the visibly armed guard. No signs to announce the policy; it just states it on the receipt. Which you get AFTER you already make a purchase. Plus only TWO cashiers on a busy Sunday.
They kept my $9.98 but lost a customer.; the best kitchen curtain selection in purto rico; Always a fun visit. Like a treasure hunt. Fair quality products but at a great price.; Didn't find what I was looking for but the workers were very nice don't forget to say thank you and nice clean place; Excellent store and great prices.  Access from PR-2 and exit 46 from PR-22

Address: CGJ4+8PF, Manatí, 00674, Puerto Rico
Opening Hours: Monday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Friday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Saturday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM

Reviews:
I usually received good service here. But lately, the service has been lacking.

A few weeks ago, I was waiting patiently in line at the Pharmacy department. I heard one of the technicians tell another that she had a client waiting. It's one of those moments where you would expect at least an "I'll be with him in a moment". Instead, I heard her respond, rather dryly and rudely, "let him wait".

Today I left quite a few prescriptions for me and my daughter. I arrived at 7:43PM  because they told me my medications would be ready after 7:20PM.They had a guy guarding  the door to prevent clients from entering.  Even he said they closed at 8PM. But, they didn't let me in because they were already performing their closing procedures. Why didn't they just say "we close at 7:40, you may need to pick it up tomorrow". They would have saved me a wasted trip.; Drove over two hours from Fajardo, only to be told from a guy guarding the door that the pharmacy closes at 8:00pm. It was 7:40pm,,, and google shows they close at 9:00pm. Get your hours of service straight.; I drove all the way from Rincón, PR and got there at 7:50pm and they didn’t let me and my family in. EVEN THO THEY CLOSE AT 9PM that shows on Google.; Big selection of every day needs (pharmacy), customer service is ok, Hello Kitty store on second floor, loved it!!!; U will find everything need it, good attention

Name: Parguera Plaza Hotel
Address: Km 3.2, XXF2+J82, Carretera 304, PR-303, Lajas, 00667, Puerto Rico
Opening Hours: Monday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Thursday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Friday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Saturday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Sunday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM

Address Components: XXF2+J82 (plus_code); Puerto Rico 303 (route); Lajas (locality); Parguera (administrative_area_level_2); Lajas (administrative_area_level_1); Puerto Rico (country); 00667 (postal_code)
Reviews:
This hotel was amazing! Everything was super clean and well kept. We also got to meet the Owner, it was his birthday and they had different activities the whole weekend which was a fun surprise! The pool is 24 hours and they have a lobby bar that is also 24 hours. Perfect location, right in the heart of the small town and steps away from the beach. It was the perfect stop for my boyfriend and I on our way down south. The service was amazing and the food was also great! Would definitely recommend.; Making the trip to La Parguera was one of the best choices of our trip, but staying at Parguera Plaza Hotel was the icing on the cake! The staff at the bar/restaurant were so friendly. The rooms were spacious and very clean; the house keeping service did a great job at giving us fresh sheets and towels. The VIEW from the ocean balcony cannot be described in words, so beautiful to wake up to. The location is near all of the restaurants and night life. Although during the weekend the music was quite loud until 1-2 am, it was well worth it to stay at this hotel. If we come back to Puerto Rico, it will be to visit La Parguera and stay at this hidden gem.; Got interior room for a night. Was awesome and affordable, great location and service. Interior room doesn’t have much of the way of windows so it might not be for everyone, other rooms have glass balcony doors. Free parking was very convenient. 24hr pool was excellent, it had a live DJ the night we stayed.  Would recommend and come back.; I can’t recommend it more. Is the nicest hotel in the entire south west area.  Is located in the same Poblado and across from the piers to rent a boat or take a tour. You can walk 10 steps to enjoy the square area and life music during the weekend.

When you arrive at the hotel you feel the breeze of the ocean, is like you are transported to another places. From the lobby you can see the ocean and the pool, where they have 4 cabanas inside the pool. In front they have a lovely restaurant where I eat multiples times and I love the food, the drinks and the friendly services.

The room I ended up staying, was the best one. I arrive with the view to the ocean in the front with a door to the balcony. The balcony is small, but nice. My room was close to the terrace wish is almost private to us.m, the perfect spot for the sunset.

The bed was comfortable and big, the entire rooms were really comfortable and had everything I need.  I was surprise to see a mini bar full of snacks and drinks, it’s not so normal anymore in small hotels. Beach towels and a beach bag was a nice touch.

Hotel Team: Thank you for all the details in my stay and for the amazing upgrade, I feel special  and definitely want to go back. Hopefully for new years to enjoy the New Year’s Eve party.; Had a great experience at Parguera Plaza Hotel. My family and I stayed one night but wish we could have stayed longer. Everyone was SO friendly- front desk staff, barista, bartenders, and waiters. The pool was beautiful and the welcome drink was much appreciated. We had a fantastic breakfast as well.

One minor critique, the barn door closure to the bathroom within our room did not allow for much privacy. There was a sizable gap on each side that we tried to cover by hanging towels.

Easy location right off the highway.; It's at a good location including pharmacy drive thru. Inside you can also drop your prescription and walk through the isles and shop all type of products. There's a nice area of perfumes for men and women, also jewelry and purses. It can get busy and bring your own shopping bag. 4 stars for parking.; Most things you might need in emergency situations, they have; food, snacks, medication, board games, car oils, household products, hygiene products, and emergency birthdays gifts and decorations.; Awesome place friendly people too.; Love this place

Reviews: great location, friendly staff, plenty of parking; It's a drive for me, so it's not the only hardware store I use, but it can be worth the drive: they have good prices, good selection and great service. They also have online ordering now too! Bonus!; On emergency leave from work to take care of my baby sis in PR Comercial Don Benja (local ACE Hardware) was there to the rescue.  The 30 amp breaker blew for the home's water heater and needed to be replaced asap since I was bringing my baby sis home from her hospital stay. They were very courteous and quick to assist and prices were fair. Good place to shop especially during the Corona virus pandemic.; Not good customer service they need to tell there customers exactly how their delivery service works. Not good. Supervisor not customer oriented.  Did not have solutions his solution was to take back his material if I was not happy with his response. Will not do more business there.; They always have everything I need!!! And they are very attentive.

Name: Farmacia San Pedro
Address: 3700 Carr 116 #101, Lajas, 00667, Puerto Rico
Opening Hours: Monday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM

Reviews:
Have anything you need in case can't go to a mayor store or Mall.; I stayed at Lajas and its adjacent area for vacation. This place is great for tourists to shop.

The pharmacy has a big retail section and provides a very good assortment of daily supplies. You can pretty much find everything that you may need during a trip. I also bought all my souvenirs and postcards here at very good prices. Later on, I found the same magnets selling at 3X at San Juan airport. They also provide mailing services, so I mailed my postcards from there.

In addition, the service was fast, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I had a great experience here.; Great place to shop they have everything even nicotine patches witch I got there. 👍👍👍 Also thank you for your patience with my Espanol it's no bueno 😂👍👍; This is THE best pharmacy on the west coast of the island. It is located at the entrance of La Parguera, so you can't miss it. So, just in case you need a last minute anything, this is the place to stop! They also have the most helpful and courteous staff which makes this place a true gem. I am especially grateful for their team at the pharmacy and, Mrs. Lebrón :); Excellent selection of OTC meds. Liquor, Frozen stuff, even a Hardware section.

Reviews:
Drive thru window, very good!!
No Coke on fountain, very bad!!
But they do have Coke in bottles and ice in cups so that’s a partial fix.  Though last night’s cup had a bad taste, normally it’s fine. Good place!; I reported them to Ftc, FBI & LOCAL POLICE. EVERYTIME I COME HERE THEY STEAL ACTUAL MONEY FROM MY CARDS. THEY USE YOUR CARD INFO! SO DON'T USE ANY CARDS WITH THIS BUSINESS! IF YOU COME HERE ONLY USE CASH.; A friendly little store. They have beer, wine, and liquor. Also snacks and a basic smoke shop. Friendly and efficient service is always a plus, and that's what they have here. Oh, they also have a drive thru service window. They stay busy so I'm not the only one that thinks this is a great little store.
I first posted my review 4 years ago. Now I've lived in the same neighborhood  over six years now. All of us have gone through a lot in the past couple of years. These guys still take care of their customers as always. The prices are higher now, but aren't they everywhere? They stay busy and it's still a great little store.; They are quick and always know what I want .. even the new workers; Save your money go to another store they steal ever day new price an check the dates on everything I had bought some old items the tall skinny guy up sales the most I noticed

Address: 797 Gold Hill Pl S, Woodland Park, CO 80863, USA

Reviews:
Great in person but don’t order online.
Phone is disconnected and email bounces back. Placed an online order and couldn’t get a person. Had to go to the store.; Great liquor store! Very convenient location and great parking. Haven't been in here in a while.  The lighting and overall cleanliness is much improved from a year ago.   Wine,beer and liquor selection is still amazing . John and his staff are very friendly and helpful! Highly recommend!; Thank you Gold Hill Wine & Liquor for supporting the Teller County Regional Animal Shelter, in our efforts to find living home for all of the animals that pass through our doors!; Great selection with great prices! The woman who usually runs the register is super knowledgeable & very amazing each time we go in. Unfortunately, I give three stars because the guy who sometimes runs the register with the dirty blonde beard has a bad attitude every time we come in and is very unhelpful. He ignores me & snatches my I.D. From my hand & does not want to give me the time or day; but is willing to give other customers better service.; I was going to give this establishment a 5/5 if it wasn't for the fact that one of the employees at this store a heavy set man with a short dirty grey blond beard always wears a trucker hat and a grey hoodie, is completely rude to myself and my one of my friends, this guy has no respect his whole attitude and body language changes. However I gave this review a 3/5 because the nice woman with blond hair is simply amazing she loves to talk about different alcohols she is so knowledgeable about the subject and her attitude is simply amazing.

If you’ve got an ABC board where you live, it’s worth a stop to get a few things that aren’t always available back home.; Today was the third time in the past couple months I tried to go there but closed during their business hours with no sign explaining why. Also, their phones lines are down so you can’t call them. They have nice wide aisles and pretty much any liquor or beer you can imagine. It’s a huge store with plenty in stock.; Always well stocked with lots of box deals with promotional products and gift sets... Great customer service 👍; They hooked me up within 10 minutes.  Love shopping here. They are on point and great selection. I don't drink and finding a friend request was made simple. Thanks bunches.; If you cant find it the supermarket of alcohol that is King Spirits, you dont need it. They are always well-stocked with any alcohol you could think of.

Name: Walmart Supercenter
Address: 715 N Main, Taylor, AZ 85939, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Tuesday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Wednesday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Thursday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Friday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Saturday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Sunday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM

Reviews:
Larger with more options than the one in Taylor. Go early in morning when opening, less crowded, better parking and items more likely to be in stock.
Avoid Fridays and rest of weekend during tourist summer travel as campers from valley often wait to stock up till they are in the area and then selection is much more limited or out of stock.
Shop and go can be difficult to use in the store with internet often dropping off making app difficult to use. Like the self checkout line reserved for scan and go shoppers.; Everything is locked up and it is a major annoyance to shop. I understand the amount of theft but at least employees don't leave for lunch with the keys and you have to wait forever or just have to go someplace else. The new layout of the store is pretty annoying.; The place is very clean, the employees and cashier are nice and helpful, they helped me get a full refund on a product that broke! Although there are very little items that is available due to the store being packed. Reviews:
I like this place for edibles..  cannabis comes already prepackaged. I prefer the tall glasses jars where you can see what you’re getting.; AWSOME STAFF!!!! They're kind, knowledgeable, and have great personalities. I have literally refused to go anywhere else. I feel like a normal person when I go there. Even the security guards are kind.
Everywhere I go where there is security, they seem to have a chip on their shoulder.
If you can get here, get here.; I enjoyed patronizing this dispensary until my experience over this past week. It is important to note that I have spent over $1500 here in the last 3 months. I bought 28 grams just last week for $99 (monthly special). I called the next day to purchase more (because every time I finally find something I like here, it’s magically “sold out or only available in 3.5” the next time I come-terrible sales tactic, by the way); the person on the phone hung up on me when I asked if they had more (my Spanish is perfectly understandable). Next I called a couple more times throughout the week- no answer.

Today, Monday, I went in person and was told there was only 3.5 available and I’d have to pay for each one individually (this is the problem with prepackaging-you don’t know who wants what, how much, when or where). The staff member Queris was able to find 28 grams in the back, but now they suddenly want $140 for the same strain, claiming it’s a different special (same strain, same month).

This is classic bait and switch advertisement and is incredibly illegal. I am not sure if cannabis is something DACO regulates, but will certainly be reaching out with them. The best part was when the worker told me I couldn’t have my phone in my hand as per Salud 😂 (& no, I was not recording, taking pictures or anything and regardless this is otra mentira).

To be noted: there is never any type of supervisor or manager onsite or available in all the times I’ve gone here. I generally know more about the product than who is waiting on me. If the owner is an honest and ethical person, they will reach out to correct this. Sorry I have to give you a 1* review but there is no other way to get through to you, sadly.; Excellent service, amazing customer service from Kiomar B., truly help me find what I was looking for. Excellent, and the place is always neat, friendly and clean. Super amazing customer service!; Very polite and informative.  Security was at door at all times.

Name: Needles Liquor Store aka Mother Cline Liquor
Address: Purgatory Resort, Durango, CO 81301, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Tuesday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Wednesday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Thursday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Friday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Sunday: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM
Address Components: Purgatory Resort (point_of_interest); Durango (locality); La Plata County (administrative_area_level_2); Colorado (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 81301 (postal_code)
Reviews:
This place rocks. Considering most tourist atmosphere have very few choices and all over priced, this place stands out in a crowd.

When visiting Purgatory you don’t only have to order from bar, especially if you like a wide variety of craft beer, although the pic I shared is all my wife’s choices of IPA, they had a great selection and best of all allow you to make your own mix 4 or 6 pack, even taking bottles from new packs.

So far we have visited 3 times and each visit we always have seen the same smiling face behind the counter, and always a pleasure to deal with.

Can’t comment on Liquor as I am drawing a blank, but I do recall tons of wine selections, and little tucked away beer fridge in back offers all the bulk 12 pack traditional selections.; I always love getting wine, beer, liquor, etc. at Mama Clines! She has always been good to me :) Highly recommend when you’re skiing at Purg or in North county!; This place is a lifesaver in North County. I live up here, and driving to Durango to buy beer is not exactly ideal, so it's awesome that I don't have to do so. They have a GREAT selection of beers. I'm pretty particular to IPAs and they typically have six or more different types of IPA alone, though lately I've been sticking to one in particular. Anyway, they have everything else too, from the old timers like Bud and Coors to Sours and everything else that's excellent, that you didn't even know about. I don't who does the ordering, but the guys who work in here have a great handle on which beers are the best to try next if you're just looking to explore. The owner is super nice and lives nearby - pretty much as local as you can get. If you're staying at the mountain, it's well worth it to make the short drive as you'll get a much better selection here than the small liquor store over there.; Mother Cline has beautiful hair and was very helpful with the liquor requests. Thank you for a great experience and for paying so much to be so close!!!!; Favorite liquor store in La Plata County. Such a sweet owner and staff. Always a pleasure seeing them. 10/10 would recommend.

I come here alot just because it's close by. Most items are over priced here. But they have a huge selection of everything. Drive thru is always busy so people pay the difference. They do charge a card "fee" so bring cash.; Coldest beer in the South Side a little pricy but all in all cold beer; The staff are always joking and friendly. They do all pricing by head/brain... Yep, let that sink in. 😆 seeing as my math is always math-ing, I do the numbers in my head too. I don't agree with this method, but for the most part, they usually shorten the bill. It's always funny to watch them do math... like: how did you incorporate the taxes in this. 🤣 🤣 🤣 Sometimes, they are overpriced, but then I just remind them that they overcharged me and they fix it.; Great neighborhood market !! Reviews:
Definitely liquor, not so much econ. The owner might be able to make it more Econ by manipulating Russians or something. I have no idea how this supply chain works. Anyway, still a solid store. Next to a lot of cool places, too, so you can avoid the mafia level markups of nearby bars.; This store is truly outstanding. The prices are amazing and there is always something great on sale. The owner is very helpful and makes great recommendations. Stop by, talk to the owner, and leave with something inexpensive yet great.; Good prices for a small place good selection.; This store is great. The owner takes a personal interest in the customers and makes great recommendations. You could walk in and buy the “name brand” liquor but the owner takes the time to show you the better products from lesser known brands that are both better and a great value. I have never regretted taking his advice. I have never been to a store where I see that the owner takes such a positive vested interest. Great experience!; Had my sharpening truck/bus parked smack in front of his business.
I believe he is the owner but if not,  Mr. Owner this nice person deserves a raise.
Honestly I shouldn't have parked there so I could service the Barber College next-door but it was kinda early in the day.
Still, he approached me humbly and kind asking if, will you be parked there very long?"
I assured him that I didn't plan to be long at all.
Since he was so kind and I understood that he needed the 2 spots I had basically encroached on I felt obliged to at least go in and shop.
This is a clean and amply supplied Liquor Store.
Awesome choices of Top Shelf Wine, Liquors (sweet to tongue tied) and Whiskey through Vodka.
I left with a vintage Chardonnay but more importantly, a great appreciation plus ongoing loyalty to and for this little Liquor Store.
Don't take my word for it, see it for yourself!
I promise you will go away with the satisfaction that I felt.
Oh ya, decent prices on ice-cold beer....etc.
Skip big box and get yourself a Liquor Store owner that gives you everything.....especially service.
Nuff said  eh

Reviews:
I stumbled into this hidden gem today.  I walked in and was promptly greeted and acknowledged by the friendly staff.  I was impressed with their selection.  They carry a good selection, from mezcal to rye.  The prices are at market value.  There are certain items here that might be priced a bit higher, but if you live in the area, you're paying for "convenience."   The place is clean and well organized.  I'll definitely be coming back again.   Come check them out for yourself!!; Very well stocked , great customer service and they also deliver!! Highly recommend!!; Primos Liquor is hands down the best liquor store in town! The selection is incredible, catering to all tastes and preferences. Whether you're looking for a rare whiskey, a fine wine, or just a casual beer, they have it all. The staff is knowledgeable and always ready to help with recommendations. The store is well-organized, making it easy to find exactly what you're looking for. Plus, their prices are very reasonable. I highly recommend Primos Liquor for all your beverage needs!; Primos Liquor is hands down the place to go for your 21+ refreshments!!!!

They have an expansive selection of beer, wine, liquor, and, more. All sold at affordable price point. Don't see what your looking for? No problem, just let the shop owner or a staff member know and they will request the item, then keep it in stock for you.

Friendly, clean, and inviting atmosphere. All good vibes here.

Keep it local SA and bring your business to Primos Liquor!; One of the Best Small owners around.Well stocked fir the size and a small mix of items not easily found in the area .The friendly interaction and recommendations was from knowing not a guess .I'll be back too see what they have sideline..A fir sure repeat stop .Great service n rewards 😎

Reviews: Yaucromatic is a wonderfully colorful town with so many great paintings to admire. The vibrant art really makes the place come alive! The experience was a bit tiring with all the walking and steps, but it was well worth it. The town was very quiet, probably because we visited on a weekday, but that added to the peaceful atmosphere. Overall, it was a very pleasant visit, and I’d recommend it to anyone who appreciates art and a bit of a stroll.; A Beautiful little plaza!  It’s worth the visit all the way to Yauco.  Everything else is closed on Sunday so I recommend to go on a Saturday.  The artwork is amazing and the yarn bombed tree is impressive!!!; Really colorful place but the walk is a bit tough but its totally worth it. There's a QR code with an interactive map of the place so you can see all the artwork. Make sure to bring a water bottle, and sunscreen.; Day trip to Yauco did not disappoint. Wear sneakers and bring water. Interactive map is very useful. That way you see all the amazing art. Art is spread out so be prepared to walk.; Loved it but you've gotta be fit to walk up and see all the beautifully colorful houses. No wheelchairs or strollers as you will have to go up hill and lots of stairs.

Name: Walgreens
Address: 55 W Apache Trail, Apache Junction, AZ 85120, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM

Reviews:
Walgreen has always been my go-to for personal products. But you've now gone to the digital coupons just like the big grocery chains.

I just put $40 worth of eye drops back on the shelf after attempting for fifteen minutes to figure out how to use the app and coupons. The cashier even helped me make a login and password and scan the labels, and they still wouldn't come up. If you think customers are going to do all of this just to get the price shown ON THE SHELF, you're crazy. Looks like I'll be ordering online where the price shown is the price paid.; Absolutely worthless location, the older lady with gray hair along with her managers literally made up multiple excuses to not help me because it was going to take a little bit of effort. I’ve been using these services for the last 3 years and this is the only location that ever is so difficult to actually get service. You can clearly tell every employee here hates their job and will do whatever they can to avoid doing anything beyond standing around. They are disorganized to a point of frustration none of them have any sense of urgency they treat you like an Ahole just cause you patronize the business as a customer. If you don’t like your job FIND A NEW JOB. It’s sad too because the location is ruined by terrible employees, I will say when I have used the pharmacy that has been fine though every other service they offer is a joke due to incompetence and dissatisfied employees.; Why bother having 2 drive through lines open if you’re only going to work one of them?!? If cars choose to wait in line they should be taken as they come to the window since each car can choose to wait as they please. It should be up to the person at the window to only help cars in lane one and never say a word to cars in lane 2. The older brown haired lady is rude and for some reason wouldn’t help lane 2 at all. This location always has the worst pharmacy staff.; I am so happy you carry BeatBox beverages! Please stock Green Apple 🍏 That one is the best!; Friendly people, they looked through available coupons and found me a great deal on my prescription, thanks!

Name: Walgreens

Reviews:
What used to be a place to quickly run into is now taking forever. Lines are long, place is understaffed, and most recently, they have entirely gotten rid of carts and baskets -- I needed to buy a bunch of stuff, but physically couldn't carry it. The staff seemed to just shrug when I asked what to do. So from this point, the nearby grocery stores will have my business instead.; Blanca is very good at customer service.  She answers questions, listens, and tries to get you a deal on meds. I hope the manager takes note of her exceptional service . It is typically very good service here.; The mangers helped me with my phone that was not charging properly. I kept trying call lyft to take me back to the shelter,my phone was not going thur it would not take a charge to finish my verification to schedule my ride (mean while I kept going out side out to check if they send me a ride)finally I chargerd my brick to charge my phone yes!! I got my ride
Sent to me with verification. I want to thank the managers & worker for Being patient and understanding  to my problem. I was in the store for 3 hours ..; Went in for bandages etc. to care for a dog bite. Everything was way overpriced (compared to the CVS near my home).

More importantly though their selection of wound care products was smaller than their selection of get-well cards. I couldn't get what I needed.; Bad customer service,  intercoms did not work, had difficulties filling my prescription. They kept saying my order would be in the next day,  after a couple off days,  i asked for my prescription back,  but even that was hard.  I'll go else where.

Name: Walmart Supercenter
Address: 500 AZ-90, Sierra Vista, AZ 85635, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Tuesday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Wednesday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Thursday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Friday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Saturday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Sunday: 6:00 AM – 11:00 PM

Reviews:
We felt singled out. The guy was literally hovering over our shoulder as we were checking out. We have no need to steal. As we were exiting there was two ladies checking our receipt. One lady said there's only 1 juice listed. I showed her we paid for 2. She said she didn't see the jug on the receipt, I had to point that out as well. If you all are so concerned with theft, you should hire more cashier's to do the job.

We are native American and felt that we were singled out because of the color of our skin. As my husband loaded up our items. I went back into the store and there was no one at the door to check receipts. Our friends didn't get there receipt checked either.

This is the most uncomfortable visit we've ever encountered at any Walmart. I feel it was racial profiling. So NO, we will not recommend this Walmart to anyone.

On another note, half of the lights were out. We had to use our phone light to look for items. Very inconvenient. And they had no more jugs of water.; This is probably the best stocked Walmart I've ever been to.  They have EVERYTHING!!  Wide variety of items.  Very clean store. Best selection of Blackstone products here too.  I even found a few clearance items that were too good of a deal to pass up.  This is certainly the place to shop in sierra vista.  Nice selection. Of local items from U of A too!!  I hope you enjoy this review.  Click "helpful" if you read this.  Thanks 😊; Just like at the old walmart that used to be across the street, the aisles are piled with pallots of merchandise making it mostly difficult to change lanes. I had hoped when this new supercenter opened it would maintain the crowded aisles more efficiently, sadly it wasnt.; As always the isles are packed with pallets of goods waiting to be stocked, so the customer has to squeeze and dodge the pallets. Like normal stores stock up when your closed. Only one register open, why do they do this as employees watch you like a hawk, so why don’t they just do their jobs after spending the whole time making sure things were paid for. I’m really starting to hate this store. Employees are always on their phones which is against company policy.; This is strictly for the people who drive the carts to do the Walmart pickup orders in the store. GO GET A CERTIFICATION TO DRIVE. Cause damn you guys are not qualified. I’ve lived here less than 2 weeks and both of my kids have been hit/ or almost hit by these asinine workers. First my 1 year old son sitting in my car while I’m looking at something lady rams into my cart with my son in it not even a little tap like a full on crash. And today I can’t even pick cheese without a different lady slamming through doors an almost running down my 6 year old. Absolutely unreal. Pay attention or get a new job that doesn’t require driving anything.

Name: Walgreens
Address: 1950 E Fry Blvd, Sierra Vista, AZ 85635, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Thursday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Friday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Saturday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Sunday: 7:00 AM – 12:00 AM

Reviews:
If I could leave negative stars, I would. The lack of urgency in the pharmacy is atrocious. They don’t mind wasting people’s time when serving them. Save your time and go to another pharmacy to have your prescriptions filled, you won’t be sorry. The associates in the front are usually helpful and quick, maybe they should help the others learn how to use the and check people out.; Here we go again, allergy season & my usual Pharmacy has been out of 24 hour Claritin D.  Walgreens to the rescue.  Plenty of parking and right off of Fry or Coronado, this place is within walking distance of grocery store, food venues, and many more.  This location is always clean and well organized.   You can also get passport photos done here.  Staff is friendly.
Update: 3/7/24
Wife wanted some cosmetic 💄 stuff.  Dolly was awesome helping out with the nails, deals, & options.  Spent more than originally planned, however, was worth the trip with the savings and the incredible help we received.   Kudos to Dolly; I don't know what happened they used to be great. Auto refills not done. Orders weeks long not filled. When you have chronic serious conditions you rely on them. But i have gone without and with auto refills this shouldn't happen. After YEARS of being a loyal customer,  I'm going to another pharmacy and I will never be back.; I RECOMMEND YOU GO TO ANOTHER PHARMACY FOR YOUR NEEDS. I rarely write these, but this has been the worst pharmacy AND STORE experience I've had. Currently on hold for 57:52 and still holding. After being on hold in the pharmacy for 28 minutes, I called the main number to ask if the store clerk could help me to know, if the pharmacy was even looking at their phone. IDK, I'd, as employee who takes ownership of her job, may take a peek and at least let the customer know how things were going over there. And if pharmacy was not even looking at the blinking hold light on the phone, I wasn't going to hold any longer and would have thanked her for her help. But I didn't have time to finish my sentence before she transferred me to the same pharmacy hold music that I was already listening to on my other phone. I called back hoping this time to finish my sentence. Clerk didn't answer but directly transferred me to the hold music in pharmacy (pretty sure she recognized my caller id number). This rudeness didn't sit well with me. You're not associated with the pharmacy and can't/won't help? Ok, tell me. But. that. no. I called back with the intent to request to speak to a manager, was immediately transferred to pharmacy hold music 2 more times. I called back, and the clerk just hung up on me without a word. I called back and clerk answered. I requested to speak to the manager. She said, "Sure", then there was silence. I wasn't convinced I hadn't been hung up on again. Spoke to the manager about the unsatisfactory customer service and rude behavior. No resolution. She just soothed me, the customer by listening. Job done, I guess. Now after 1:11:48 on hold with pharmacy, I'm hanging up and will take my business elsewhere.; Whoever owns this Walgreens, you need to hire more people. Been on hold for 20 min without even talking to somebody to find out why my medication has been delayed for the last two weeks... It's insulin, not something crazy complicated or exotic. If your pharmacy staff is too busy to pick up the phone after 20 minutes, you don't have enough staff.

Update: After 35 minutes of being put on hold without talking to a single person, I found a smaller pharmacy in the area. If your insurance covers it, go to Beewell Pharmacy. Nice folks and they picked up the phone within a couple minutes. I'm transferring ALL of my prescriptions to Beewell Pharmacy now because the corporate monster that is Walgreens has failed me for the last time.

Reviews:
As always I was in and out of Walgreens. Great quality of everything, the store Brands is A-ok, Muah!!!!  Clean store, clean associates, the store just...... smells brand new and good. !!!! Love Walgreens- prices match the product _ but the sales... the sales are way awesome (and sometimes clearance too). All together its beyond good, and I'm not exaggerating, I always go home with a bag and show my husband like, look at all the stuff I got for only this much!!!!; We have been with this pharmacy for one year and have many meds through this pharmacy. The only problem I have is that they seem to be out of common meds often and have to order them from Phoenix. I started a new med 2 mos ago, and within a week of starting it, one of the pharmacy called to check on me to see if I was doing ok with it. I have NEVER had a pharmacy do that. I really appreciated that.; This Walgreens pharmacy is terrible. Long waits to pick up prescriptions, it takes them forever to fill prescriptions, and more than once the prescription I was supposed to pick up on a specified day has been out of stock on that day. The automated phone system for this pharmacy is also usually grossly inaccurate as far as pick up times. Or it could just be that the staff at this Walgreens pharmacy is extremely slow and fails to meet the estimated times the automated system gives you. Unfortunately it’s the only pharmacy in the Vail AZ area.; Probably the worst Walgreens Pharmacy I have ever seen.  It's always understaffed or closed.  Multiple times I've had major delays in getting prescriptions.  One time I even had to drive to a different Walgreens over 30 minutes away.  I would recommend using a different pharmacy.  I still like Walgreens Pharmacy, just not this one!!; This pharmacy is horrible, our script was put in on Friday the 22nd they told us two hours it would be ready.  We explained we had to go out of town for 3 days and tried to see if we could move the script to a different Walgreens.x they denied that’s.
Coming back 4 days later we went to pick it up after not hearing anything from them. We got there to pick up on the 26th and they told us 2 hours….worst place to go.  This is the worst customer service, the staff is unbelievably rude.

Name: Mile High Wine & Spirits
Address: 435 S Vance St, Lakewood, CO 80226, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Address Components: 435 (street_number); South Vance Street (route); Belmar (neighborhood); Lakewood (locality); Jefferson County (administrative_area_level_2); Colorado (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 80226 (postal_code); 3329 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
Always love Mile high! Just had a lovely wine tasting and pairing party with help from the experts at mile high. I showed them my menu and they found excellent, unique wines to match each course. Thanks team!; The economy is crashing, and like all blue-blooded Americans (or just millenials in general), I planned on making my financial situation worse by making my body numb and my decisions impaired!

This place was actually a good place to visit though. They do have a wide array of options for people to drink to, and their wine selection was pretty packed.

They were open earlier than the local cidery and brewery nearby, so they were convenient, too. Too bad they didn't carry Locust Cider.; They have a good selection of local beers, wine, and liquor. I got some cider that isn't available in my area and it was very tasty.
The staff was helpful and polite.; Excellent service with friendly staff! Typically, they also have a nice selection of harder to come by local beer. Conveniently located under the Whole Foods, getting a good drink with your groceries is awesome!; I love that the folks who curate the selections don't waste their shelf space on a lot of junk. That's not to say that you can't get cheaper beers and wines and spirits here if you want that, but there is a solid baseline of quality that I don't see everywhere else. Do you want a good Chardonnay for less than $12? They have them. Do staff recommendations carry weight in your decision-making? These folks are knowledgeable. Are you looking for both PBR and Pliny the Elder? Yep. Are you browsing for a new brew to try? Look around!  Have you had something elsewhere that you would like to buy? Let them know.

Hey, you can buy some beer at grocery stores these days, and I'm all for freedom of choice and convenience, but when we buy alcohol for any occasion - even if that just means enjoying a cold one after yard work - this is the place. The prices are extremely competitive, and you cannot beat the selections offered.

5/11/24 Update: still the best around!

Name: Liquor Express
Address: 1605 E Apache Blvd, Tempe, AZ 85281, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 12:00 AM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 AM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 AM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 12:00 AM
Address Components: 1605 (street_number); East Apache Boulevard (route); Tempe (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85281 (postal_code); 5924 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
WHISKEY/BOURBON HUNTERS - this is a great spot and has a wide range of allocated whiskey. I have visited many of the top rated liquor stores in the valley and as you would expect, all charge secondary prices on rare/allocated whiskeys. This liquor store was priced fair relative to the secondary market on a lot of their allocated whiskeys and the owner/staff were all very friendly. As you can see from the picture, I picked up several nice bottles including JM cigar blend, all of their staggs (at the time bottles of 23A/23C), OF 1924, michters 2024 barrel proof rye, a few store pics and some other nice bottles. There were many other good bottles like blantons, wellers, Elijah Craig, aged JD, Woodford, whistlepig, etc. They also had a good selection of daily drinkers like OGD 114/BIB, benchmark small batch, early times BIB, OF statesman/100, barrel, very old barton, etc.

All in all, this will definitely be a store I visit more frequently and hopefully this review doesn’t blow up my new spot lol

EDIT: added 2 more pics. The owner and staff are always very friendly.; Visited Phoenix for the first time with the wife. Whiskey hunted solo while the wife was in business meetings.

They had a nice inventory of rare whiskey but out of my price range as they were secondary prices. Had a good talk with an employee about whiskey. Walked out with a Smoke Wagon Malted Rye to add to my inventory back home.; Was looking for something no one had. They were able to find it and communicated quickly and when they said they would.; Excellent store the staff is very knowledgeable about it's products, the staff is always friendly and helpful,  The best liquor store in Tempe; I have ordered from them a few times on Doordash because it's convenient and it's close. I don't know if they can't read or if they don't care about the details but they have sent me the wrong items half the time. And instead of telling me they don't have the item I want available they just pick something without my approval that I don't like and I'm forced to pay for it. ONE star. Not recommended. I would give them zero stars if I could.

We called to see if they had blackberry Crown Royal. He said yes we do $30. When we got there, he said he found out he’s the only store that has it north of the river, so he’s charging $50 a bottle now.; Pricing is high in comparison to others in the area. Had to ask clerks to give the correct amount of change (shorted)on more than one occasion. I go to Mr. T's on Englewood. Better pricing, service and they give me the correct change without me having to ask for it.; Best place to buy Liquor and other stuff. Huge variety of liquor. I always enjoyed very warm welcome and greetings from their highly professional staff.
Strongly recommend place for liquor lovers👍; This store is by far the best world liquor store and best convenience store around. The customer service is excellent. Everybody is nice, friendly and helpful. I visit the store a couple times a week and consistently I received top-notch service. Check it out for yourself.!; Older gentleman who works the cash register was extremely rude. Also I bought a pineapple fanta from there that was 2 months expired. Very dissatisfied and will gladly drive to the quiktrip across the street next time I want a drink.

Unless it's convenient and you don't mind a lack of conversation and politeness, i recommend save your money and go elsewhere.; Best liquor store in Glenview!! They always have the best choices in stock. I pass by at least a couple other franchises just to come  to this place. Thank you!; What a great little find . I went today for the first time and met the owner who was absolutely lovely and welcoming . A great shop on a street that still needs a lot of love . Highly recommend !; Certainly not the greatest selection, but they have the Essentials and service with a smile.; Best liquor and wine store around. Great selection of local wines and liquors. Owner is super friendly and knowledgeable…and can point you to some great area hiking trails. :)

Reviews:
What a great owner! Extremely kind and helpful. I highly recommend stopping by. Support local I say! Thanks you for the amazing service!; We were headed to the nearby deli when we decided to investigate Jack's on the off chance that we might be able to find a decent birthday gift for our son. Frankly, I was skeptical, but my wife thought we should give it a try.

What we found was really good wine at really good prices at a store that seems to feature really good service. We couldn't be more satisfied.; Great variety of hard to find craft beers. Seems to be moving more in that direction (Craft section getting bigger) which is a good thing. Don't let the exterior fool you.; Good selection and competitive prices across the board.  Great service as well.  Jack has brought in items I requested numerous times.  Lots of craft beer and cold box space.  Highly recommended!; In addition to being a great liquor store with a good selection, Jack and his staff are THE NICEST staff I have ever dealt with at a liquor store.   Friendly, in a good mood, happy to help, happy see you, and seem to genuinely like their customers and their work.

Name: Padonia Liquors Specialty Store
Address: 51 E Padonia Rd, Timonium, MD 21093, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: Closed
Address Components: 51 (street_number); East Padonia Road (route); Timonium (locality); Baltimore County (administrative_area_level_2); Maryland (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 21093 (postal_code); 2306 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
I am consistently disappointed with their selection of wines and the service has always been subpar in my opinion, but as I was in the area today, I thought I’d stop in for a bottle of gin. I was treated to a group of guys ridiculing, laughing, and mimicking a prominent female politician whom I  happen to admire. What made it worse was that the clerk was laughing loudly at every single one of their jokes and joining in with them. When they saw me, they all got a sheepish look on their face. These were grown men, acting like frat boys. I left without purchasing anything. There are far better lower price options in the area. If I were a business owner, I would have a conversation with the clerk as to what drives customers away.; Great store, great people.  Took a bad fall, old knee's, one fellow came out, and a customer helped me get back up. Glad I didn't have a 32 pack of BUD LITE, probably still be laying there  !!!; I have seldom had a better customer service experience. The staff are solicitous and polite without being schmarmy. If you ask for help they will bend over backwards to help you, and if you make it clear that you would like to browse then they will let you be. It is a rare gift to read other people's cues so well.

There have also been a few times that I've asked for something unusual, been told (as I suspected) that there is not much demand for the beverage, and then come back to find it on the shelves. I love this place.; Very friendly and helpful staff. I always enjoy shopping here.; This is my go to liquor store when I visit Hunt Valley for conventions. If you need something ordered, they are second to none when it comes to service and can usually get what you want within days after you call them.

I'll say it again... Second To None!

Reviews: This place is a hidden gem. The staff is so friendly and knowledgeable. Even though we came in almost at closing time we weren’t rushed. We were given samples without pressure to buy. Prices are extremely reasonable and the selection is abundant. Do yourself a favor and stop in here. I wish we were local, instead of just visiting. This would definitely be our go to store.; Staff are wonderfully helpful and knowledgable.  Great selection and nice to support a small private business.  If they don't have something - they will get it for you.  Also - I lost my wallet outside the door recently - a kind person returned to the store and someone from the store came to my home to personally deliver.  Above and beyond service and selection!  AND - dog friendly!!!; I stopped in in my way to dinner at a BYOB restaurant and needed advice on the wine to bring along. The staff and owner were extremely knowledgeable, very friendly in a comfortable way and made good recommendations, they definitely made our dinner more enjoyable .; Owner is very pleasant and helpful. Prices are good. They are open til 7 on Sundays after other stores in the area have already closed.; Lots to choose from.  Clean. Great organization of types. Help dog friendly if not more.  Friendly staff.

The gentleman that owns the store was so nice. Said if he didn't have what I was looking for he was happy to order it for next time. Well stocked store and friendly service. Highly recommend!; American owed family business!  Avoid the pain and strain to your brain that is dispensed by the chains and support your local businesses.  This family is offering value on service and product. If you're at a festival it's worth the walk south to their booth instead of buying the overpriced adult beverages at the fair booths.; Fantastic shop, always great customer service and are never out of what I’m looking for no matter what time or day I go in, my go to store when I’m in Acworth by far; Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. Great selection.
Got my Medalla Light here !; Acworth Wine & Spirit located in the Kroger plaza off of Jiles Road has some of the best tequila selections you can find in Kennesaw! The owners are very sweet and will make you feel welcomed every time you visit the store. Make sure you stop by and check them out!

Reviews: Best prices in the area. Helpful staff. What you'd expect of a liquor store. Nicely laid out (unlike some that feel crammed into a shiebox).; Wine prices are fair but whiskey prices are hugely over inflated. Go to Total Wine for whiskey. Woman behind the counter is one of the most unfriendly people you'll ever meet. Definitely feel like I'm being judged when I check out. The guy who runs is very nice however.; I feel like they are watching me when I shop in their. They don't give out bags, so I'll bring a bag in cause I'm buying multiple items. There's a guy in there that watches me carefully and when I take the items out my bag, they grab my bag like I got something in it.; I purchased 4 items which were 3 shots at $1/ shot and cigarettes that were $11.50. The total shown was $15. I questioned why it was $15 and not $14.50. He stated that he added .50 just in case I use a card. I said I have cash and he took the .50 off. Be careful and check your totals because they will charge you additional money and not tell you. Once I caught his mistake his customer service was EXTremely POOR!!; Owner is very impressive with the knowledge of his inventory. Very reasonable prices.

Reviews:
Extremely clean store with an amazing selection of beer, wine, and liquor. Well organized and great prices. Staff is friendly.

Really appreciated the amount of options, strolled through the aisles to see it all. Couldn’t resist not buying the absinthe when I saw it, so few places have this and this store had half a dozen options.; Michael and Lauren were great! They helped me out!
I bought a great bottle of 15 year old Armenian Brandy in a glass blown glass Dragon.; They have such a good selection! I'm always finding new beer at this location. The other plus is that they have a walk-in humidor that is well maintained, so the cigars are always fresh.; Came here to support local business over Total Wine which is a mile from my house. Website says they specialize in tequila which one would assume would imply mezcal. They had maybe 5 kinds and all were over priced and the selection was simply not good.; Need something alcohol related? This place has it all. Friendly staff too. Big man at the register with a beard was super friendly.

Reviews:
Visited on a Saturday when they have several wines for tasting. Ok wines not to my palate. Perused their collection and found quite a few reasonably priced wines that have good taste descriptions. Bought a few reds and whites and they were good and as described.; Schaefer's provided wine for our June wedding at the Grove Redfield Estate. From start to finish, their customer service was impeccable!! I visited on a Thursday afternoon, and Schaefer's had full onsite staff (a sommelier, an event planner, even a food pairings expert) who helped me pick out wines. The sommelier even opened a couple bottles for a free tasting since it was a large order. Schaefer's delivered the wine to our wedding venue and picked up a few unopened bottles after the event for a refund. Highly recommend for events and we'll definitely be back!!; By far the best and most unique liquor store I've been to in Chicagoland. They also sell an amazing selection of French cheeses and crackers, olives etc. I came in to pick up a 6 pack of beer, I came out with delish craft beer and cheese, worth the detour.; Building a charcuterie board at home? This is your spot! Great wine, beer, cider, spirit selection, fresh cut meats, gourmet items, and all reasonable prices!; Schaefer’s Wines, Foods and Spirits, is a warm and welcoming store to buy beverages, lunch and to shop at one’s heart for Winery and other elegant surprises. Today, I just bought beautiful winery bottles with Dogs and Horses and love the many designs and had them put in a gift box for myself!

I want to start collecting winery bottles as a winery cabinet collection and to discover more beautiful bottles at this store!

The staff workers are great and kind! They take their time, to Gift Wrap the Winery Bottles This Holiday Season and Are Patient to make sure the bottles are beautiful and well protected!

So Shop this Holiday Season @ Schaefer Winery Company and  Any Special Occasion for your Family Friend or Loved One!

Can’t Wait To Buy More Bottles!

I’m glad to be apart of the Team!

Thank you And Merry Christmas To All

By
Miss Talia

Name: Binny's Beverage Depot - Glencoe
Address: 85 Green Bay Rd, Glencoe, IL 60022, USA

Reviews:
This is a smaller Binny’s, but it’s packed to the gills with great wine selection. Once in a while a very good sales too.; Ive been to quite a lot of Binnys and other liquor stores in the Chicagoland area and after stopping at this one for the first time today, I can confidently say it is my favorite.
Its a smaller store but the selection is far from small and the employees are all very knowledgeable and friendly. Compared to other stores I felt much more welcome at this location (although my experience at other stores was not negative) and every employee I spoke to was able to offer a suggestion, help me out or have a conversation with me about the tasty things I should have on my radar. Great store, great employees and great selection, not much more you can ask for.; Stop by to get water and getorate  guy at register ask me for id for that 😂  i though he was playing around but he wasnt !; I stopped into this location roughly a month ago while I was in the area for some errands. While I had no set intention on purchasing anything specific, I was immediately greeted by a friendly staff willing to help offer recommendations. Jason specifically went more than above and beyond in offering insightful recommendations and meaningful explanations on why he recommended an item. Ultimately I walked out with a bottle of whiskey and then a few bottles of wine I would've never thought to buy on my own. This location was doing a wine tasting later in the day that Jason recommended I come back for to help explore some wines I may have never tried. When coming back again he immediately offered assistance and pointed me in the direction of a few choices that resonated with the information given to him, instead of just a random bottle on the shelf. Both of the wines he pointed to specifically I shared with friends and all parties agreed I made the right choices through Jason. Not only did I benefit twice that day by visiting, but also a few folks around me got to experience the wine and recommendations as well. Wholeheartedly recommend visiting and will return as often as possible.; Not a lot of great stock— but if you’re looking to be racial profiled and accused of stealing, management has what you need.

Shame on this store, Binny’s will never get money from anyone I know, but luckily we aren’t living in 1925 like this prejudice manager. Do better.

Name: Hunt Valley Wine, Liquor & Beer
Address: 116 A Shawan Rd, Hunt Valley, MD 21030, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 9:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: Closed
Address Components: 116 A (street_number); Shawan Road (route); Hunt Valley (neighborhood); Cockeysville (locality); Baltimore County (administrative_area_level_2); Maryland (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 21030 (postal_code)
Reviews:
I enjoy visiting this store, although a bigger scotch and Bourbon section would be nice.
Decent prices, good selection overall and some rockin' store picks in Bourbon.
The best part is the service, genuinely nice people, especially David in the whiskey area. His guidance and assistance is greatly appreciated. The service is what brings people back time and again. Thanks!; Always a great selection. They are always making small improvements to layout and inventory to stay up with the latest trends while still always having the staples.; In many states, Wegman's is allowed to sell wine.  Maryland is not one of those.  It's clear this stand-alone store is their solution.  The signage all uses the same colors and fonts as in the Wegman's store next door and the shopping carts are all Wegman's carts.   So what?  Well, this means the prices are excellent.  But it also means the selection is doubtless regulated by corporate.  So you aren't going to find any rare gems here.  But they do have a good solid selection.  Service is also, well, serviceable.   They do sometimes seem short on staff, but managers are always willing to come up and open a register.  And in these post-COVID days, you can't ask for much more.   Unless you are looking for one of those rare gems, this is a solid choice for beer, wine, or spirits.; Decided to take a ride on the Mta light rail after a walk around the inner harbor and was happily surprised at the variety of IPAs that they have available I should have drove got a few looks on the train with a case of beer but you know what I didn't leave any empties on the train.  Love the selection and staff recommendations; Doesn't deliver.  Hard for folks with walkers or wheelchairs. There is a large Brightview in Hunt Valley, so several hundred seniors are inconvenienced.

Name: Midway Discount Liquor
Address: 1000 Midway Dr #5, Harrington, DE 19952, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 9:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM

Reviews:
Well stocked liquor store, with friendly staff. We shop for the sweet low alcohol (5%) wines here. The lady that works there is always pleasant and helpful. I recommend this store.; This is usually my go to when I'm home, prices are average and owners are nice.

They make use out of all their space, there's a lot in there for the size. I have no complaints about it.; Sunday June 11th 2023 at 550pm there were customers walking out when I pulled up. I get to the door with another guy who pulled up the same time as me. He tries the door and it's locked... they locked the door and closed up 10mins early... never going there again.; I love this store Bob is so funny and nice all his employees are very friendly all I do is walk 9n and they have my cigarettes on the counter waiting for me 😃 I often see Bob loading liquor and beet on his cart taking it to customers cars now That's professional service it always makes me smile keep up the excellent work everybody Sincerely Denise B; Liquor store of my choice when they are open, a bit pricey for more high end Alcohols but truly is my go to place after a long week at work and needing so Alcohol. Always go here for all my Alcoholic mixed drink starters, testers, and got some free stuff (Namely a bird dog Whiskey shotglass) fromt wh store itself. Really nice individuals working there and knowledgeable for some mixed more well known mixed drinks.

Always recommend here than some other places.

Name: Cranbrook Liquors
Address: 52 Cranbrook Rd, Cockeysville, MD 21030, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 9:30 AM – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 9:30 AM – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 9:30 AM – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 9:30 AM – 8:00 PM; Friday: 9:30 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: Closed

Reviews:
What a great store! Fantastic fine spirits, Bourbon, scotch selection. Overwhelming and head turning, but great. I enjoyed my shopping experience, an employee was wonderfully helpful, kind and informative. I will be making regular visits here, very positive experience.; I wish there is 0 star, we specifically asked one of employee that is it manufacturer date or expiry date but he said it is special beer made by Budweiser and it is manufacture date so we bought it and went home after open the case we saw that it is expired, when we came to return it same employee said ‘you already knew that it is expired’ which is totally a lie
And they took it back & got different beer.; Love their specials!
Nice people!; The customer service is outstanding. And you can find some one of a kind bottles and really great sales throughout the store in every category, including beers!; This is my go-to place for liquor and beer. Very large place with very good beer, wine and liquor selection. They usually seem to have good prices, and they often have good specials for things on sale

Name: Towne Tavern & Spirits
Address: 10257 York Rd, Cockeysville, MD 21030, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM
Address Components: 10257 (street_number); York Road (route); Cockeysville (locality); Baltimore County (administrative_area_level_2); Maryland (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 21030 (postal_code); 3201 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
Great dive bar.  We were in town for a quick layover and this was the only good looking bar that I could find on Google.  Close to our hotel.

Bartenders were GREAT!  Very welcoming and helpful.  They helped with some restaurant recommendations that worked out perfectly.

Small but good selection of draft beers.  It's been a long time since I've had National Bohemian on tap!  YUM!

There's an on-premise liquor and beer store so you can stock up before you head home (or wherever you're going).

By the way, the pizza place in the shopping center is really good.
The Original Giorgio's; Went here for the first time in years. Service was good but not many people there. They used to have bands  and were jam packed. Could be a really good place if they bring back the live bands; A little pricey but awesome people, respecful and always show attention to the customer by making sure he or she is having whatever her or she would needed.Love this place but just a little pricey😄👍; Neighborhood bar.  Go Thursday, Friday, Saturday  and tell them Maddog sent you from Google.  Good food coming after the remodel; Moved back home this past year and needed a new liquor store close by;
had a drink while I was there  and met some lovely people too! Bartender was speedy and good conversation on the side.

Now usually just use it every few weeks to buy some cider 🍻

Name: Pina Wine & Spirits
Address: 5753 NE Antioch Rd, Kansas City, MO 64119, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM
Address Components: 5753 (street_number); Northeast Antioch Road (route); Kansas City (locality); Gallatin Township (administrative_area_level_3); Clay County (administrative_area_level_2); Missouri (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 64119 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Great staff, low prices and they got Miller Light twelve packs in glass bottles who could ask for more!!!!; I often have to call hours after I place an order to get them to deliver.  They're often out of my beers which leads me to have to find another store to order from. When they have my products and their app works well and they're paying attention to online orders they're great. Thus the 3 star review. I might just take my business elsewhere because I can't stand having to call after I place an order on THEIR app multiple times.; They have my favorite Lambic framboise! And only $10.99 yay! So happy!; Thanks for he last minute Birthday delivery with the sweet note! She loved it! Great job!; This store is one of the best new additions to the northland.  I was blown away by the craft beer selections, I felt like a kid in a candy store!  As I stood there, unable to decide on what to buy (I wanted them all) the owner asked me if he could be of any help.  The best part was that he explained he could order anything I wanted that he didn't have in stock. I felt like I was in my own little piece of beer heaven.  I was also stunned at how low the prices are considering how top notch the choices were.  Equally impressive is the wide variety of wines, bourbons, whiskeys, vodkas......the list goes on and on.
If you haven't been to this amazing place, you are missing out. Plus I love the fact that I am supporting local business.

Address: 931 N Dupont Blvd, Milford, DE 19963, USA

Reviews: On the small size and doesn't carry everything but for this particular visit it had exactly what we want it; Amazing selection and fantastic prices!; Great variety, fair prices, and staff that has actually tried the products to help make informed recommendations.; Good prices, lots of choices.; The employees are honestly great, the one guy that works there is super knowledgeable about wine and took the time out of his day to explain the differences to me and I really appreciated that. The young woman is also very friendly and helpful. The store is always clean and well stocked. My boyfriend and I love stopping by to prep for parties

Reviews: My absolutely favorite. Just close by home. Ower is the coolest ever!; Great customer service! I needed a keg for my husband birthday and the owner helped me with a special order. He let me know me know when it was delivered & ready for pick up. Definitely getting my business; The employees are helpful and the prices are reasonable and convenience on a scale from 0-10 is definitely a 10 good place to get your spirits; The staff is very nice. A bit pricey compared to the other liquor stores. Very limited selection of tequila and some other spirits. Great beer selection. Parking is limited, if its busy you'll have to wait for a spot. Overall it's kept clean and organized, I wish they carried a larger selection of some spirits.; Small liquor store with decent prices and a wider selection than you expect from the outside. Beer, wine, ready to drink cocktails  can all be found here. What impressed me the most was the larger than expected liquor selection in the back room.  It will be a regular stop when I'm in the area.

Name: Shawan Liquors
Address: 11339 York Rd, Cockeysville, MD 21030, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: Closed

Reviews:
Best selection in the area, for pretty much everything. I always go here first when I'm looking for something new.

Friendly staff, but I don't think they know much about whiskey, because I've never had anyone try to talk to me while I'm browsing.; Nice store. Clean. Well laid out. Friendly staff. Good selection of whiskey. Lots of store picks. Will be added to my list of go-to stores.; Excellent selection of Scotch Whisky! Multiple Octomore and Bruichladdie Black Arts releases! Campbeltown’s galore including many Springbank, Hazelburn and Longrow bottling’s. Almost every single Compass Box bottling, all reasonably priced. Much of what you can’t get from Virginia ABC or Montgomery County is here.; This place had a great selection. As I was walking through the store, I could hear patrons asking the owner for specific liquors. He was very enthusiastic and willing to help. They have a great selection of bourbon. Very fairly priced. If you’re in the area and you want a good deal with a good selection, I would absolutely come here in a heartbeat. The establishment is also very classy. You feel like you are an important patron to them. They’re not just looking to haggle. They’re looking to make a long lasting relationship.; We've been regular customers for probably 15 years. Couldn't ask for better or more attentive service! The staff is personable,  knowledgeable and helpful.
And their selection of beers and alcohol is top notch.

Reviews: Maps says open til 2 or 215am i call to confirm at 147 dude answered said nah were closed. Closing in 2 minutes. Onv; Luv this store, they sell City Vodka 🍾🍾🍾; Pretty quick drive thru. Staff has been kind of rude sometimes. Decent selection.  Small store. tax included in price. If you pay with a credit /debit card, you must spend over $5 and they charge an additional 75 cents. Overall, not a bad place; Grew up going to this place or drive through. When this was still Avaondale not old town! Was in town a few months back, had to drive through and orfer a cold one like my old man in the 70s. Also got my favorite candy like I did as a kid. Good to see something orginal left of Avondale.; Good service. Please add Beatbox beverages! The green Apple flavor is delicious!

Name: Switchback Liquor Store
Address: 1149 Zion Park Blvd, Springdale, UT 84767, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Friday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Saturday: 12:00 – 8:00 PM; Sunday: Closed
