Reviews: Not sure the “professionals” in the pharmaceutics area know what HIPAA law consists of. Can’t keep count on how many times they’ve been very loud talking to patients about their prescriptions, no matter how long the line is you will hear everything. Very uncomfortable and unethical.; The Walgreens in Isla Verde is probably in the safest area. The Police department is next door! Always welcoming and friendly; I went yesterday and left a prescription at the pharmacy around 4:00 pm. Then I received a text message about the status of it. About 7:45 pm I went to the store to pickup my prescription  and young lady after review the computer ask me if I was sure that I left the prescription because there was none at the computer. I said sure. Then she asked if I used another number.I said no. Then she asked if a remember the person who received .I said a man with black hair. She said that he does not know the people who worked at that time.So why you asked. Then she was looking around the desk I did not find it. The again she asked Iid I was sure that I left the prescription in that store. I thought that I were having the first effect of  Alzheimer. Finally another person asked about the Dr who made the prescription and then she remember that there was a problem with the  codes and they withdraw the prescription from the system. This incredible they should leave at the computer indicating the problems. Thank God that this lady was there and remembered where they left the prescription. I was ready to make appointment with my doctor to see if I was beginning to have Alzheimer. The young lady di d not apologize. Very bad service and procedures.; Super slow prescription and vaccine service, if they are not closed due to lunch. Prepare to wait and pay a premium. More a convenience store than a well-run pharmacy.; Unfortunately right at the entrance/exit door or close to it there are very frequently  employees smoking cigarettes. 🚬  I was waiting at the disabled parking near those two smokers employees. They should be farther away like in so many companies.Second hand smoking is no good!

Reviews: I have been printing my wedding photos at this Walgreens location for years. Today, I tried to print a canvas photo, and was told by the shift lead, Kayla, that I need a signed copyright release form from my wedding photographer giving me permission to print these photos. Apparently, this is because the photo "looks like a professional photo." This is apparently not a new policy, but Kayla is just deciding to implement it herself. According to Kayla, "just because other people don't do their jobs, doesn't mean she isn't going to." About an hour later, I sent the order to a different Walgreens and it was printed with no issues. In fact, the manager of the other Walgreens rang up my order. Interesting that Kayla seems to be the only one who has this policy. I won't be returning to this Walgreens location.; Went to the pharmacy for a quick question about free prenatals because a clinic I went to told me they’d provide a free bottle. the lady with the blonde hair gave attitude and said we don’t do that here idk why they’d tell you that. I showed her the list of the Walgreens we could go to and we were at the wrong location which was our fault. She said yea you’re at the wrong location rudely and I said ohh okay we typed it in wrong thank you. I didn’t like her attitude though.; There is a woman in the pharmacy with long dark hair that should not be allowed to work with customers. She’s got the worst manners and she is openly rude to customers. Even the other employees looked at the customers with apologetic eyes because she was being so unprofessional. Not helpful. Defensive and rude to people.; Made me pull out my ID from it's plastic protector by cashier that was sniffling and sneezing all over the place. She clearly was sick and then touching all over my ID. You can verify my age without touching my ID.; I try to always be as thoughtful and kind when I post reviews. However, there is only ONE employee in this building that actually cares that you’re there and actually knows how to sell/work the register. I went there on my lunch break one day and purchased a water. It didn’t ring up properly, and instead of explaining what was happening, the cashier just walked away and left me wondering what happened…. While I patiently waited looking around precariously, she finally came back and finished the transaction as though nothing happened. Very strange and weird. Or you have someone who is as old as the Statue of Liberty trying to check you out. Unless you’re trying to be there for an extra 10 minutes, it’s not worth it. Just go to CVS at that point.

Great liquor store with top quality staff. The prices are good. Staff helped scare me toward a local option that was quite tasty.; I would give these folks more than 5 stars. Great service and extremely knowledgeable. We found the store on Google Maps and went there to pick up supplies for a few days vacation. We found Mr Schwartz and co. friendly and willing to help us pair some wines. During our stay we also chose from one of the largest inventories Ive seen in the area. Definitely curated selections and premium spirits, all in a small strip mall! Go here for the best service and selection in Gulfport, perhaps the entire MS coast.

We will definitely be back
Urban Cowgill
June 2022; Bin 605 Wine & Spirits was extremely neat & clean. The store clerk gave me a really good price on my bottle of Fireball, great place!; Great experience. Had a good selection. Reviews: Very good selection and staff is very helpful/ friendly.  Prices are average if you are military you can get a discount.  Also join the rewards program and you will get money off on your future purchases.; Stopped in for the first time today. Great whiskey selection and good prices. I appreciate them putting the allocated stuff on the shelf and allowing a fair first come, first serve. Very patient and helpful staff. Will definitely be back; I love this place! they have a good selection and the build a drink corner is always fun and interesting. the staff is very friendly and always helpful. Crystal I  particular always makes a routine visit very enjoyable; Ooooo I love this place! Great selection, they deliver and they add a nice personal touch. Go in a few times and they even remember you!!; CANAL WINES AND SPIRITS IS ONE OF THE BEST LOCAL LIQUOR STORES I HAVE EVER FOUND ANYWHERE NEAR GULFPORT.  AND LUCKILY FOR ME, THEY ARE JUST UP THE ROAD FROM ME.  I TELL EVERYONE ABOUT HOW HELPFUL THEIR STAFF IS EACH AND EVERY TIME YOU ENTER OR CALL THE STORE.  IF THEY DON'T HAVE THE PRODUCT YOU ARE SEEKING, THEY WILL LOOK IT UP AND ORDER IT FOR YOU IF THERE IS ANY WAY POSSIBLE.  I HAVE NEVER MET ANYONE THAT WORKS THERE THAT DOES NOT ALWAYS DO THEIR BEST TO HELP YOU WITH ANYTHING THEY ARE ABLE, ANSWER ALL YOU QUESTIONS IF THEY CAN, AND IF THEY CANNOT, THEY WILL TAKE THE TIME TO TRY TO TRACK DOWN THE INFOMATION YOU ARE SEEKING.  THEY HAVE GREAT SALES, WILL  TELL YOU OF UPCOMING SPECIALS, GET YOU A CASE PRICE IF POSSIBLE AND CARRY IT ALL OUT TO THE CAR FOR YOU.  AND HAVE I MENTIONED, THEY ARE ALWAYS VERY NICE TO EVERYONE.  GOOD OWNERS, GOOD STAFF, CLEAN STORE.  GREAT PLACE TO TAKE YOUR BUSINESS!  THIS IS THE BEST ADDITION TO THIS PART OF THE AREA WE HAVE EVER SEEN.  I SURE HOPE THEY STAY HERE WITH US FOREVER TOO!  (AND YES, THIS IS AN UNPAID COMMENT FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY CRABBY SOUL!)

Reviews:
Always greeted when entering, clean, bright and plenty of help. I always find what I need and the staff are very helpful.; Good service and happy camper.; Absolutely horrible system at this branch. I am a Walgreen's fan, and this is an atrocious example of the chain. Speaking purely about the pharmacy, worst set-up and customer service I have even experienced. After waiting in line as instructed, the tech just told me to wait on the side when she saw the medication script. No help. No explanation.

Then, even the pharmacist I saw could not care less about her job. The pain medication I needed for my elderly family member was not available, so I asked if she could check with the other Walgreen's about 20 min away (Puerto Rico is strict about pain meds, understandably) and she said no. Flat out. She knows which codes the other branch would need to verify, and she had the info in front of her so that she could confirm it would be legit. "No". Flat out. Thankfully I found it at the 4th pharmacy I went to, no thanks to this branch. Experience in Dorado Walgreen's was much better.; Too expensive horrendous customer service. Address Components: 995 (street_number); South Cotton Lane (route); Canyon Trails (neighborhood); Goodyear (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85338 (postal_code); 4604 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
Honestly fulfillment for pickup orders sucks. I’m waiting over 5 hours at this point for an order I placed when they estimated would be the least busy time. I understand they have no control over the queue of orders but there is definitely some management issues in terms of productivity. This is the closest target to me and the further ones are quicker and have my order done ASAP it feels. There’s no sense of urgency or care to be honest. Whether I go in or place an order it’s taking forever to get home either way.; I have always loved Target... but this location has some work to do on cleanliness and their understaffing at the registers. Bathrooms are always disgusting... toilet paper everywhere, tampons, poop, etc. Very dirty always... how hard is it to rotate people keeping the place clean? But then again... they are very understaffed at the registers. I have never come in here without waiting in a line for checkout. With all the empty lanes available, why not hire some more people to help your customers? I do like the staff members I have encountered... always kind and helpful. Why not hire some more?; This review is for the Target Goodyear West location. I do not like to give bad reviews, but this is something that I've noticed really needs addressed at this store's location. SELF CHECKOUTS! I shop at this store often, and every trip it is the same experience, 5 registers open 15 registers closed with very long lines. I shop at many Targets across the area, and they all have self checkout! It makes no sense that this Target has not been remodeled given the amount of customers that shop at this location. The employees are always friendly and apologetic for the long lines, but it is not their fault. This is something upper management needs to address sooner than later.; This store is nasty, first the store smells nasty, the floors are dirty and some of the ceiling tiles have mold 🤢they should remodel this whole Target.; 815 at night and a sea of people and only three lanes open.  That makes for a bad customer service experience.
I guess the reason why they call it target is so you can keep an eye on the cashier 30 people back.

Name: Brix Wines

Opening Hours: Monday: Closed; Tuesday: 11:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Wednesday: 11:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Thursday: 11:00 AM – 7:00 PM; Friday: 11:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 11:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: Closed

Reviews:
We had a great time sipping yummy wines and watching the golf tournament at this super local wine bar. It’s well known for their selection of higher end CA wines with 14 years in the area. Plenty of seating and yet a very comfortable, sit for 2 hours kind of place.

I really appreciate the wine selection as a dedicated wine enthusiast as the owner has a great palate and doesn’t just buy the juices that sell to the masses.

Retail, buy a bottle, sip here and take the rest home or just order a glass. It’s my new fave in Carefree.; Fun, lively atmosphere with live music. We tried an Argentine Pinot Noir that was very reasonably priced. And we enjoyed the Lobstar food truck, too.; “Stumbled” into a wine bar in Carefree, AZ. Surprised by the great wine selection by the bottle. No corkage to open and drink on premise. Regular retail pricing, not restaurant pricing. Plenty to choose from if you want to order by the glass too. Selecting wine by the bottle can seem overwhelming but the owner was so knowledgeable, he helped me find the right wine at the right price point! I’ve been to several wine bars around the valley and this is the best one by far.  I’ll be back!; A nice quiet place with perfect ambiance. Brian behind the bar was the consummate host.; Bryan runs a great wine bar! Highly recommend!!! 🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷

Reviews:
One of the most Racist experience I've dealt with in years. it’s my cousin‘s 35th birthday and I enter the store which I’ve been going to for years sadly start looking at top shelf tequila he doesn’t have prices on a lot of the bottles after 10 minutes of ignoring me I asked for prices he reluctantly gave me one price then refused to tell me any other prices, repeating himself, the cheaper bottles are on the bottom. After telling him, I’m looking for a nice bottle for my cousins birthday. I’m not looking for cheap. He continues to tell me the bottles I’m asking for too much. As if I could never afford his bottles. Ended up buying a bottle at Safeway down the street for $150. I will never be spending another dime there. I hope anyone who doesn’t want to be treated fly crab shouldn’t shop there either especially people of color.; Trickery and duplicity. Their trick is to tag items with a low price at the shelves, but they charge you more at the counter. Tried to buy an item that was tagged $19.99 at the shelf, but the guy charged $27.00 at the counter. When this issue was brought to their attention, they verbally abused the customer.

Dishonest behavior 👎🏾
Poor customer service 👎🏾; trickery!!! Address Components: Ste 77 (subpremise); 35 (street_number); Avenida Juan Carlos de Borbón (route); Santa Rosa (sublocality_level_1); Guaynabo (locality); Santa Rosa (administrative_area_level_2); Guaynabo (administrative_area_level_1); Puerto Rico (country); 00969 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Walgreens the store is great but the pharmacy needs a lot of improvement. Even though it appears to have a lot of staff there service is extremely slow. It doesn’t matter if you are dropping a prescription order, check on your prescription or picking up you will need to be prepared to wait and wait. An forget about trying to call for information on your prescription because they never answer. It is a shame since the majority of the clients are elderly. It is not uncommon to see 3-4 staff members chatting among themselves when you are in a line waiting. I wish they could get more efficient sometime soon although I do not have a lot of hope that it will happen.; I have been waiting more than 1 hour for a 5 auto line.  I still have 1 car in front of me.
Unbeleievable.
I can’t imagine elderly people with pain and other illnesses having to go through this calvary.  By the way it’s not peak hours it’s 9:15pm.  Simply unacceptable…; Terrible, same as other comments.  I waited 30 minutes in line to pick up a prescription sent yesterday by my physician and was told rudely that I should have called first. I would need to wait another half hour for them to prepare the prescription. It took 1 ½ hour to get my medication.
I asked to speak with a manager and was told he left at 5:00, it was 4:30 but nobody could find him.
Time to go back to a small local pharmacy. Much better service, they actually get to know who you are and the prices are normally better anyway.; Regarding covid-19 vaccine it's the worst service i ever seen. I set up an appointment for my 91 year old
mother and my sister,  7:50pm & 8:00pm and they got their vaccine at 9:30pm. Staff were very unprofessional and disorganized  taking people as they come in , not by appointment. Reviews: Standard US Dufry, Don rum was the best buy. Everything else like continental US. The staff were mediocre, no sense of urgency at all. Always ask for the STEB bag, just in case you have to pass security again, don't get the fancy bag or you might have to throw liquor away.; Duty free shop that you have to walk through after passing through airport security, on the way to your gate. Plenty of employees to grab you. Usual cheap duty free prices. Lot lsnof liquor and perfume and cologne and cigarettes to choose from. Very clean and pretty well organized.; I am writing this email to inform you about an incident I came upon at the Dufry location at the San Juan airport. I bought a Kylie Lip kit from there and there was no tester for the item. I bought shade 108 dark red. I tried the dark red on my hand and it was almost tan. It was not the same as what was shown in the picture. When I went to return the item, I was told that I couldn’t because I tried it on my hand. I was told that if it’s been “used” they can’t take the item back even though I had just bought it. No where in the receipt did it state that rule. Even on the website it does not say they don’t take returns on open packages. I asked if I could exchange it to a shade I like and I was told no. The cashier said I tried on the tester so I should have known what the shade was like, but they did not have a tester for that shade. The cashier spoke to us in a rude demeanor. Stared us down as we were shopping as if we were going to steal. I absolutely did not appreciate this as I felt profiled for my race. I am extremely disappointed with my experience and the costumer service at this location. I was unable to return or exchange my item, I was given no help to go on about the situation, the lady that helped me was rude and seemed to profile based on appearances, and now I have a 31 dollar lipstick that I know I will never end up using. I hope the company can make this right.; I was being followed in the store by an employee Manuel the whole time. He didn’t speak until I found a bottle and he took it from me stating he was bringing it to the front. I have a problem with this because he did not do that to anyone else in the store. In other words I was profiled. Just a heads up if you are tan/brown be prepared to have your dignity tarnished.; I wish I could give them zero stars. I order my alcohol online and went to the store to pick it up and was over charged. I was told that the transaction was cancelled, and the new order would be the only one charged to my card. I have called them every day since I got back home, and they still charged my card 179.20 plus the new transaction. I have emailed them and no response this is unacceptable to treat people that brings your company business. I will not do business with Dufry again. I am beyond pissed.

Reviews:
Terrific place to spend a few hours whether you’re waiting on a flight or not. Free parking, snack bar, liquor bar and bathrooms downstairs, with terrific outdoor views of the airport both on the lower and upper levels. Airplanes of all sizes appear out of the clouds to land, while others taxi by to their take off. Really very thrilling.; Excellent place to wait for your loved ones at Luis Munoz International Airport. Watch the planes takeoff from your car, or have a drink or bite at the cafe. There’s also a full store with all kinds of snacks and drinks.; Really a nice place for waiting for your family to arrive. They have a full-size Bar a small market area, a inside and outdoor seating area (if you don’t like the AC); It's one of the best spots to watch planes on the planet. Nice sportsbar,good local food,beer,hard liquor,souvenirs, small shops,clean bathrooms, and really nice personal. The second floor is the best place for spotting, at least in this area of the Caribbean, for the accessibility and installation services. A must to visit place if you love aviation, especially during the weekends.; Fantastic car waiting area while waiting for your loved one to arrive. Clean and beautiful inside. Air conditioned and a little convenience store inside.  Opens at 8am. Closes at 8pm. 45 minutes maximum parking, which is free.
Has a lovely terrace where you can watch planes land and take off.
Strongly recommend when you just want to pick up passenger and continue to your destination. I really like it!

Name: Walgreens
Address: 14285 W Grand Ave, Surprise, AZ 85374, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM
Address Components: 14285 (street_number); West Grand Avenue (route); Grand Village Center South (neighborhood); Surprise (locality); Maricopa County (administrative_area_level_2); Arizona (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 85374 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Every single time I come here there's an issue with my prescription. It's insane not only that but you have to wait hours and hours to get them filled. The girls in the pharmacy are really nice but I really think you guys need to hire more people and stop overworking them. Do better Walgreens!!; I have recently switched from another store and pharmacy to this Walgreen's and I'm just so delighted!  I have a husband who's had a stroke and I have to keep track of all of his meds plus keep myself healthy!!  I just am so blessed that I found this Walgreen's on Grand Ave and their wonderful staff!! I was so taken for granted by the other store I left after being with them for over a year.  When I found this store if was such a relief!!  Not only do they take the time to explain the medications to me, but the staff in the store also go out of their way to make me feel like family!!
In this day and age that's amazing!!
The store manager is Mikey and his amazing staff includes Leslie and Radha who have helped me so much even with finding the right product throughout the store!!  We're on medicare and they make sure I've found the product that is covered as well!!!  I can't thank them enough!!
At the pharmacy, the manager Taylor is amazing as well as her staff Ben, Celeste and the whole team.  I always feel like they have time to explain everything to me even if there's a line!!  Now that's a store where I want to shop!!
If you're not happy with your current store and pharmacy I highly recommend you try this Walgreen's on Grand Ave!!! I know you'll be very pleased!!!; Is this Walgreens for you? If you like to wait in a line for 20 mins while employees  able to assist sit around in photos enjoying their Starbucks. Then yes this Walgreens is going to be a great fit.

On a more serious note. I have been to this Walgreens a handful of times. I have had maybe 2 good experiences. The good visits came from a friendly young man up front taking pride in his job and being friendly.

A simple expectation from customers spending their hard earned cash.

However, the reality is that 90% of the time this Walgreens down right sucks. This Walgreens has rude and lazy staff.

I literally never leave reviews for anything today is the day that changed. Unfortunately it has not been from stellar experiences. I like to consider myself fair and understanding.

My bare minimum expectation for a customer service employee is to be helpful. These employees are not.

An example from a recent experience has been a common theme at this store compelling me to finally voice my opinion and ultimately switch pharmacies entirely.

I ordered photos at 9am according to the app they would be ready by 1pm the same day. At 3:30pm I went to pick up my photos and a script. Upon arriving I waited at the photos line while the employee assisted another customer. Once that customer had been serviced I continued to wait for the employee to greet me. Attempting to respect the employee’s time I waited a few more moments. Occasionally this employee would glance up with an annoyed look. Assuming the employee needed a few more minutes to finish whatever it was they were doing I left to go grab my script.

This was an experience on its own but I will give the benefit of the doubt and assume the technician was new.

This whole exchange left that employee at photos for roughly 10 minutes. Upon coming back I walked up and said “Hello” the employee just stared at me for a second, sighed, and rudely asked “what do you need help with”
No worries… maybe she had a bad day.

“I’m here to just pick up some photos I ordered this morning.”

“name.” She rudely responded.

After about 2 minutes of her fiddling around looking for my order she says

“I don’t see it”

I double check to ensure I ordered at the right location gave first name, last name, order number. She cannot find my order no big deal. She has yet to look in the system. When I asked her to maybe check with the order number she finally was able to pull it up. It wasn’t ready. Instead of taking ownership of the situation she responded rudely
“ it won’t be ready anytime soon. We had 3 people call out blah blah blah blah.” Excuses for her sh*t attitude.

My frustration is not from the fact the photos weren’t ready. Things happen. My frustration is the lack of assistance and rude attitudes that seem to be a common theme here. This was just the last straw. I have always loved Walgreens and since moving out here this one has been the closest. These expirence have led to switch drug stores entirely I have moved my scripts and now will be driving out of my way for them. Not a big deal just disappointed. For photos and other things Amazon continues to be the best solution.

I don’t intend for other customers to read my long review. My hope is to leave some feedback for whoever it may concern.
I think most people are realistic and don’t expect over the moon customer service on their casual Walgreens trip, but with that I think most people want to spend their money with companies that appreciate their employees and customers. This business doesn’t do either, Clearly their employees don’t want to show up for work and the ones that do put forth their most minimal effort with goal to be as sour as possible.

If you happen to visit this Walgreens I hope you have an amazing experience.
They won’t get another chance from me and if your experiences are similar I suggest you do the same thing and find a new drug store!; Just got done getting some passport pictures for my Son and myself, Patrick was a true gentleman, he really made sure we were taken care of properly and was very courteous and helpful!; The cashier asked if I wanted to use the coupon under my name, I received 10.00 off my order. Thank you Walgreens. It's about time. Here it is March. But at last I received one!!

Name: Lakeside Liquor
Address: 7392 Lake Ridge Pkwy Suite 300, Grand Prairie, TX 75054, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: Closed

Address Components: Suite 300 (subpremise); 7392 (street_number); Lake Ridge Parkway (route); Grand Prairie (locality); Dallas County (administrative_area_level_2); Texas (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 75054 (postal_code)
Reviews:
We just had the most unprofessional experience. We spend hundreds of dollars in this store as local residents of Mira Lagos Neighborhood.

We purchased our drinks and purchased ginger ale over the weekend. The ginger ale had a horrible consistency, so we returned it yesterday and the clerk was kind enough to allow us to exchange it.

Today, we tried the ginger ale again with same result, so we went back to return it and to advise the store the entire batch might likely be bad. Unlike the clerk yesterday, the guy today told me it was "my problem and the manufacturer" and he did not honor my return.

As a business you are responsible for the product you sell; not the manufacturer. You can take those issues up with the manufacturer during your next re-stock, but do not make your customers pay for poor quality products sold in your store.

Needless to say, it wasn't even about the money being returned; it's poor customer service and unprofessionalism that we should not have experienced.

Total Wine and More are just off of 67; So folks, do yourself a favor for better pricing and better quality—do not patronize this shop.; Great liquor selection. Very knowledgeable staff. Ryan really knows his stuff.
Over the last few months, the cigar selection has become absolutely incredible. Best in the area.; Great selection of all spirits! Awesome customer service! Prices are great for being a neighborhood store! Additive free tequilas bourbons vodkas scotch bar supplies mixers wines cigars and beer all in one stop!; I normally don’t do reviews, but there is too many examples of when bad things happen, that I decided to kind of even it out with praise on their exceptional staff. I can’t speak for anyone else’s experience there, but Kamish and Ryan our far and above what you would expect from a general hospitality staff. Always helpful the couple times I’ve been there. Always a smile and a positive word. They are an example of what it means to take pride in your work! You can tell it’s always genuine by the vibe you get in there from beginning to end! Positive people are out there still, and I count myself blessed to have met the two gentlemen above, even if for only a short time! Great example guys! Keep setting it!!!; Good selection, but prices way to high... Bought a tall bottle of 1800 Tequila it was $60 ... Most the other places I've been is for  $40..... A bottle of medium size Don Julio tequila is $58 here other places is $38... Good selection but prices too high

Reviews:
This is a kind of store that besides going for your medical prescription you have a lot of variety on health care products, household products and a lot of more stuff at very expensive prices, but I do understand the convenience of getting almost anything in just one place, they have very good weekly specials in a lot of stuff, the place is clean and at times cashier lines get way too long and these people are kind of slow so I have left the shopping cart a lot of times and leave the store, there sometimes very elderly people making those lines makes me the sense that the management of this particular store are very unsensible people, this is a clear disrespect to those older people.

UPDATE : these people aren't slower because they don't find a way to be slower, consider other pharmacy ⚕ were you can get a better service in medication.; Just buying a Nautica cologne,nice service; The new puertorican "colmadito de la esquina", basically no choice but to pay more for the convenience of shopping for almost everything in one place. I have made my peace with that. I figured a way to spend less time and money here was to order online and pick up in store, that way I don't stray from what I actually need to buy. However, I am fuming mad after placing an order this morning for some last minute Christmas gifts hoping to pick up on my way home from work. I called the store after waiting several hours for my order to be confirmed for pickup. The associate apologized for their "system" not working, I gave her my order info. and she promised before the day was over I would be notified. It is 7 p.m. and no word, no online order status, nothing. Called the store again and after jumping the hoops to speak with an employee my call was dropped. I'ts not like I can go and purchase gifts at the mall now so I will give very "merry" apologies to the giftless people on my list. Well, thanks to my local Walgreens.; It is about telephone calls made between yesterday and today. No even one of the seven calls made to RX counter were answered. They picked up the telephone and hanged it immediately without  speaking.  Very respectful from the employees.; Friendly, once they get to know you they call you by name .It's a community driven kind of place. Usually you find everything your looking for.I always have a good experience. They are always willing to help.

On phone experience.
21st century if a "young person"is patient and KIND doing his job on phone - I called no others-I gotta going spend my money Blue Top Liquor as long as visit Fayettelle. Should add here I am what young would call an "old person" and on the phone asking him if carry brands I needed🤔.
had to call second time. Had to ask about St.Pauly Girl Beer.😊They do.
Recomend a must check out Liquor store..  Safe easy intrance and exit.
Now I really thirsty "cooler chilled perfect" beer sodie"!😉; My Son had a 4th Grader event at Ramay Jr High that we were planning on staying for a short time. We parked on the side of there Building and within 45 minutes the lady Manager had our Vehicle towed. There sign on the side where it states customer Parking only was blocked by one of there employees Vehicles. Which I pointed out. I understand if it were a Razorback Game or something where multiple vehicles would take spots would be a Problem but the Liquor store was slow with about all there lots empty with very few customers going inside on a Friday afternoon. There were other vehicles from the same event parked there before us and they singled us out for ours to be towed. This is what's wrong with America. For one employees shouldn't be blocking there signs so people can see them. Two it should not have been an issue today at the time they had my Vehicle towed. It's a shame this Liquor Store felt we were taking away profits from there paying customers when they had very little at this time showing up. If this is the case maybe they should reevaluate how they do Business.; Put in a delivery order. Called to check 45 minutes after it was supposed to arrive and got told it was on its way. 20 minutes later, the status on the app went back to "preparing", so they lied about where my order was to begin with. Won’t come back; I just want to take a moment and give these guys a SHOUT OUT for helping this Texas girl deliver some yummy beer to my Aunt who lives in the area for her BIRTHDAY today!!! You were so nice, so patient and SO VERY helpful!!! You guys ROCK and when I am there visiting next, I’ll be by to grab a few six packs from ya for myself!!! Cheers!!! 🍻

Much better than Loganville!; Great selection and service, and their points program is AWESOME! 😁👍🏿💯; I am all about supporting local businesses, however today Beverage Superstore of Grayson refused to accept a visa gift card because it would not swipe. Their explanation is that they can handle a someone’s card. Then the manager stated since there is new owners there is no way to
Manually enter the card. I guess business is so good there I will shop elsewhere. Just saying.; Bought some Crown Royal Blackberry that I thought was priced way too high compared to other places. This is honestly the slimiest, greediest store in the state.

Overall, a top-notch liquor store!; The only place I go to in the area.  They have such a great selection and always give good recommendations.  I also love the allocation drawings that they do for the more difficult to find bourbons.  Have got some really good bourbons, tequilas and wines, we would not have tried otherwise.  Seeing some of these other reviews,  you need to remember that not everyone likes the same thing.  I love the taste of Blantons OTR but know others that don’t like it at all.; I don’t not recommend this store ! I purchased a tequila from this establishment that was referred from another tequila I considered! A 95 dollar tequila at that! It was deplorable! In the north east..  if you purchase a subpar tequila  especially if it was referred they’ll exchange for a better option. This place tucked their tails and said it’s not their problem. Nonetheless I will never return to this establishment because of that. I’ll take my business somewhere else! I do not recommend. Name: South Walton Spirits (Liquor, Wine and Beer)
Address: 1104 S Walton Blvd, Bentonville, AR 72712, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM
Address Components: 1104 (street_number); South Walton Boulevard (route); Bentonville (locality); Benton County (administrative_area_level_2); Arkansas (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 72712 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Excellent customer service and great selection. I ordered via DoorDash and twice DoorDash automatically canceled my order. Brian at South Walton Spirits was incredibly helpful! He called DoorDash, and when they were unable to help, he made suggestions to get my order to me (Uber Eats). He also helped me order a selection over the phone to make sure we got what we wanted. Thank you! Above and beyond service!; Large selection and friendly, helpful staff! Found exactly what I needed for my visiting guests. Place has a really good atmosphere! Clean and inviting, well lit and well stocked. Thank you!; Good prices and pretty good selection.; The guy in the store suggested a bottle of champagne that i've never tried before

Needless to say it was absolutely delicious

Wonderful customer service wonderful selection; Have always had great service at this store, but I recently ordered a keg of beer and it turned out to be bad.  I took the nearly full keg back to the store expecting a battle to get a refund.  To my surprise, Rich called me the next day from the store and apologized profusely and immediately offered a refund.  Plus, he said he felt like he needed to do more and started to offer something else when I told him the refund would be just fine.  In this day when people are constantly trying to screw you out of something, and denies all responsibility or ownership for anything, this place is above all that.  The people here are extremely courteous and helpful, and the prices are very good.  Plus their location is great.  I will never go anywhere else.  Thanks to the staff at South Walton Spirits, and a big thank you to Rich!!

Name: Lincoln Convenient Shop
Address: 15075 Lincoln St #906, Oak Park, MI 48237, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Friday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Sunday: 11:00 AM – 7:00 PM
Address Components: 906 (subpremise); 15075 (street_number); Lincoln Street (route); Oak Park (locality); Oakland County (administrative_area_level_2); Michigan (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 48237 (postal_code); 3335 (postal_code_suffix)
Reviews:
My experience was terrible at this store and I will never go back there.  I bought an item which was damaged and when I went to return it with the receipt. The guy threatened to call the cops on me, after he said they will only give me credit which I declined. He started yelling  at me, became very aggressive and said ( you must not know who you dealing with ). He asked me to leave his store without my money or he will call the cops.

I told them to call the cops I will wait and while I was outside of the store waiting for the cops, the guy  came outside and handed me my money back and told me to never come back.

I believe they must be dealing with many people who don’t know their rights because this is not the first time I have seen them being hostile to their customers specially when you are black. I will never go back I wouldn’t recommend.

To everyone reading this. Have a lovely day ❤️; When I lived here. The store owner spit in a black young lady's face. And then he called the police on her. Hes going to mess with the right person one day. And that person is not going to care about going to jail.; We were considering renting a place in this complex and stopped at this store prior to going inside the office. The store owner is a real sadistic nazi. How this complex even allows him to have a store here? We will never be back. Avoid this place like a plague!; Lou and his family are always nice to me.  And this store is the major reason that I still live in the building.; I've lived here for over two years, the owners are wonderful! But they need more Middle Eastern & Mizrachi kosher foods.

Name: Kauppakeskus Columbus
Address: Vuotie 45, 00980 Helsinki, Finland
Opening Hours: Monday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 7:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 9:00 AM – 10:00 PM
Address Components: 45 (street_number); Vuotie (route); Helsinki (locality); Helsinki (administrative_area_level_3); Helsinki (administrative_area_level_2); Uusimaa (administrative_area_level_1); Finland (country); 00980 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Good access from Metro and bus, plenty of free parking and rooftop parking as well. Plenty of shops and restaurants for everyday life. Toilets are not taken care of properly😭.; Clean, tidy and organised! You can find almost everything you need in a local place. And you can keep yourself warm when you are waiting for the bus! Also they have big monitors to see all of the incoming buses and metros!
You have multiple choice for restaurants, coffee shops, super markets, pet shops!
They have also free internet, so you don’t need to worry about internet there!
Also they have security guards and security camera for the safety.
Highly recommended for the local people.; Great shopping centre but impossible to park a large motorhome.; One of Helsinki's smaller shopping centre but it is fresh and vibrant with a shop for any service or product; You've got spots to eat,clothes to buy,and shops even for second hand or furniture.Basically you can find most of the things you are looking for.Highly recommend visiting Saiturinpörssi shop,you can find some good deals on different items.

Name: Saiturinpörssi Columbus
Address: Vuotie 45, 00980 Helsinki, Finland
Opening Hours: Monday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Tuesday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Wednesday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Thursday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Friday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Saturday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM; Sunday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Address Components: 45 (street_number); Vuotie (route); Helsinki (locality); Helsinki (administrative_area_level_3); Helsinki (administrative_area_level_2); Uusimaa (administrative_area_level_1); Finland (country); 00980 (postal_code)
Reviews:
'housekeeping' shop with low prices. Thank you! There are not many such places in Finland, where you can buy some small details and parts for your home.
A few ideas to improve still:
-Return process is super slow.
-Also quality of goods sometimes is not good.; All kinds of things at a discounted price, mostly because stuff has labels in the wrong language or the packaging is the old design. Stock changes all the time, but you will definitely find something to buy every time. Store is very little and fit to bursting with products, so prams and wheelchairs have very little (if any) room to manoeuvre.; The only Säiturinpörssi in East Helsinki and also Tokmanni to buy stuff for home; You can find almost anything in cheap price from this shop.; I always find cheap interesting offers of everyday use items

Name: Kroger
Address: 14800 Hazel Dell Crossing, Noblesville, IN 46062, USA
Opening Hours: Monday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Tuesday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Wednesday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Thursday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Friday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Saturday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM; Sunday: 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM
Address Components: 14800 (street_number); Hazel Dell Crossing (route); Noblesville (locality); Noblesville Township (administrative_area_level_3); Hamilton County (administrative_area_level_2); Indiana (administrative_area_level_1); United States (country); 46062 (postal_code)
Reviews:
Hopefully you keep cashiers available to at least 9 o’clock every evening now. A lot of folks are going to other stores because cashiers aren’t always available and they don’t want self checkout because they have large orders. It would definitely be worthwhile for you to pay your cashier an extra five bucks to stay that extra hour and pick up another several hundred dollars worth of business. Just thought you would want to know. 😁; This Kroger location is decent and they usually have a good stock of fresh foods.
Would love for Kroger just to give discounts up front instead of forcing coupon clipping on the app or paper coupons to save. If you can afford to get the coupons and discounts, why not give the cheaper price for every single person??; This is the biggest grocery store I think I've ever been to. I got lost on my first visit. I see why the curbside pick up is popular. Deli selection of prepared food could have been better, but maybe was a busy day. I'll try again in the proper hiking gear.; This is a very nice. Kroger in a nice location. I'm only giving 4 stars since several of the salads were out of stock and the supply of fruit was a bit low.; Consistently out of staples like milk. The selection and pricing is terrible (especially for milk).  Fruit and veggie choices/ quality are suspect and soil way too quickly.
I frequently find broken eggs that have been cleaned and placed back in the container. Opened/unsealed soup containers that were placed back on the shelves. Use as a last resort, they don't care at all here.
